duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead cross-functional teams to think broadly and boldly about the future state and enable transformational solutions that can scale across the business.
Design and deliver transformational solutions leveraging new approaches to people and processes, supported by the best technology.
Work with business unit and technology leaders to design and execute ambitious transformational strategy.
Coach and develop cross-functional teams and raise the bar on delivery excellence.
Identify obstacles and proactively develop approaches to overcome them, leveraging change management best practices to mitigate resistance.
Perform quantitative and qualitative analyses and leverage data in all approaches.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or four or more years of work experience. Experience in consulting, developing strategy, and/or change management. Degree in engineering, business, MBA or advanced degree preferred. Design Thinking, Agile and/or Lean Six Sigma certification and project management experience preferred.
